name: PassTheTorch (nir9420)
description:
Description:

A small platformer to speed run.

Each death will add 10 seconds to your final score.

Controller:

Arrow to move

"d" to dash (you can dash from the level 3)

My best score is 350 seconds:

A run is completed when you finish all the levels of the game, let me know in the comment in how much time you finished the game. Good luck!

Developpement of the game:

Code by me (lua/LOVE 2D)

Sprite by me  (pyxel edit)

Music found in some humble bundle package
